net.sf.jclal.classifier

Class WekaComitteClassifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.classifier.AbstractClassifier
      • net.sf.jclal.classifier.WekaComitteClassifier
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IClassifier, IConfigure, JCLAL

    public class WekaComitteClassifier
extends AbstractClassifier
    Classifier of Weka type for committee.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo
